page.title: 14BRISTOL POLYTECHNIC
page.content: BRISTOL POLYTECHNIC,ONE OF THE LARGEST IN THE COUNTRY,WAS OPENED IN 1969.THE MAIN SITE IS AT FRENCHAY,ABOUT 5 MILES N.E.OF THE CITY CENTRE.THIS 80 ACRE SITE HOUSES THE FACULTIES OF ACCOUNTING,BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT,SCIENCE,ENGINEERING,MATHEMA TICS AND COMPUTING,ECONOMICS AND SOCIAL SCIENCE,LAW AND MODERN LANGUAGES.THERE ARE 5 OTHER SITES AROUND THE CITY,NOTABLY EDUCATION AT REDLAND,AND ART AND DESIGN AT BOWER ASHTON.THE POLYTECHNIC CATERS FOR ABOUT 12000 STUDENTS,OF WHOM OVER 5000 ARE FULL TIME.THERE ARE OVER 250 COURSES,THE MOST POPULAR BEING BUSINESS STUDIES,LAW AND SURVEYING.THE FRENCHAY SITE HAS PURPOSE BUILT SCIENCE LABS,LECTURE ROOMS,LANGUAGE LABS ETC.OTHER FACILITIES INCLUDE A BANK,HAIRDRESSERS,BOOKSHOP,LAUNDERETTE ,SUPERMARKET,SQUASH AND TENNIS COURTS.
